ABOUT_VERSION_STRING.comment: Label for button to show version numbers and licenses

BASIC_STRING.comment: string to describe basic set of settings

CONNECTED_STRING.comment: Whether or not account is logged in

CONNECTING_STRING.comment: String to state if an account is progress of creating a connection

DATABASE_SETUP_ERROR_STRING.string: An error occurred while setting up the database.

DELETE_ACCOUNT_MESSAGE_STRING.comment: Ask user if they want to delete the stored account information

DELETE_ACCOUNT_TITLE_STRING.comment: Ask user if they want to delete the stored account information

DELETE_CONVERSATIONS_ON_DISCONNECT_TITLE.comment: Title for automatic conversation deletion setting

DELIVERED_STRING.comment: Shows in the chat view when a message has been delivered

DISCONNECTION_WARNING_TITLE_STRING.comment: Title for setting about showing a warning before disconnection

DONE_STRING.comment: Title for button to press when user is finished

EMAIL_STRING.comment: The string describing account name or email address for a buddy

ERROR_CREATING_ACCOUNT_STRING.comment: title label for error when creating account

ERROR_STRING.comment: Title of error message pop-up box

EXPIRATION_STRING.string: Background session will expire in one minute.

EXTENDED_AWAY_STRING.comment: Default message when a user status is set to extended away

FORGOT_PASSPHRASE_INFO_STRING.comment: Text describing what happens when the user has forgotten the passphrase
FORGOT_PASSPHRASE_INFO_STRING.string: Because the database contents is encrypted with your passphrase, you've lost access to your data and will need to delete and reinstall ChatSecure to continue. Password managers like 1Password or MiniKeePass can be helpful for generating and storing strong passwords.

INFO_STRING.comment: Short for information, button title to get more information

INITIATE_ENCRYPTED_CHAT_STRING.comment: Shown when starting an encrypted chat session

LANGUAGE_STRING.comment: string to bring up language selector

LOCKED_WARN_STRING.string: The fingerprint has not been verified

NOT_VERIFIED_STRING.comment: To let the user know the fingerprint as not been checked

REMEMBER_PASSPHRASE_INFO_STRING.comment: Text that describes what remembering your passphrase does
REMEMBER_PASSPHRASE_INFO_STRING.string: Your password will be stored in the iOS Keychain of this device only, and is only as safe as your device passphrase or pin. However, it will not persist during a device backup/restore via iTunes, so please don't forget it, or you may lose your conversation history.

REMEMBER_PASSPHRASE_STRING.comment: Label for switch to save passphrase

REMEMBER_PASSWORD_STRING.comment: label for switch for whether or not we should save their password between launches

REMOVE_STRING.comment: The String for a button to remove a buddy from the buddy list

REQUIRED_STRING.comment: String to let user know a certain field like a password is required to create an account

RESOURCE_STRING.comment: Label for text input for XMPP resource

SAVED_CERTIFICATES_STRING.comment: Title for listing the user saved SSL certificates

SAVE_STRING.comment: Title for button for saving a setting

SEARCH_STRING.comment: Label for text field where you search for a buddy
